levels.name: Eldoria
levels.words: In the quiet town of Eldoria, shadows danced on cobblestone streets. Amelia, a curious girl with silver hair, discovered an ancient book in her attic. Its pages whispered forgotten tales. As she read, the room filled with ethereal light, revealing a portal to a realm of dreams. Brave and trembling, Amelia stepped through, embarking on a journey where words wove magic, and every keystroke shaped her destiny. Eldoria awaited the scribe who would inscribe new legends into the Book of Whispers.
